meta.content: Prescott School District of Prescott, Wisconsin. A tradition of excellence.

span.strong: Middle & High School Students & Parents - Infinite Campus for Off-Campus Learning.

div.span:
The Prescott School District online library is open!
Students from grades K-12 can have access to thousands of books.
Click this link to find multiple resources the media center has to offer!

strong.span:
2020 Seniors - you have our support! Click here to see our senior highlights grow!
CALLING ALL FUTURE 4K and KINDERGARTEN STUDENTS -

span.span: Malone Elementary School is in preparation for the 2020-2021 school year and will be creating class lists starting in May. If you have a child who will be in 4K or Kindergarten and you haven’t sent in your registration paperwork, please do so soon! Registration paperwork can be emailed to esoffice@prescott.k12.wi.us or mailed to Malone Elementary School at 505 Campbell Street North, Prescott, WI 54021. Please contact the Malone office with questions, (715) 262-5463.

br.span: Governor Evers has extended the stay at home declaration through May 26 and declared all public and private schools closed for the rest of the academic year. Click here for more inclusive details from Dr. Spicuzza. Click here for a F.A.Q.'s from Gov. Evers.
PROM has been rescheduled for June 27, 2020!

li.span: 7th & 8th Grade TRAVELING VOLLEYBALL has been CANCELLED by the league. SOCCER (Grade k-6th grade) is also CANCELLED for this season.
Traveling & In-House BASEBALL & SOFTBALL are POSTPONED until further notice. T -BALL for current kindergartners is ON HOLD.
More specifc details can be found here. For any questions or concerns, please contact Angela Magee, PCR Director, pcrdirector@prescott.k12.wi.us

span.strong: There will be no WIAA athletics until further notice.

li.span: This includes all participation including, but not limited to training, practices, scrimmages, and contests.
Coaches may provide individual workouts virtually, but shall not encourage or organize their team assembling to practice.

br.span: As we learn more about COVID 19, our Summer Campus Program registration is on hold. We will revise our timelines as more information becomes available. Please check back again towards the end of April for further updates. Click here to see what offerings we currently have.
